author: Oprah Winfrey
message: I don't believe in failure. It's not failure if you enjoyed the process.
title: Thought of the day

author: Helen Keller
message: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen, nor touched... but are felt in the heart.
title: Thought of the day

author: David Rockefeller
message: Success in business requires training and discipline and hard work. But if you're not frightened by these things, the opportunities are just as great today as they ever were.
title: Thought of the day

author: Cavour
message: The man who trusts men will make fewer mistakes than he who distrusts them.
title: Thought of the day
